channel.title: BibTeX.eu Blog
channel.description: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest BibTeX.eu news and events.

item.title: CiteDrive First Alpha Release
item.description:
CiteDrive, an easy-to-use, web-based, collaborative 'BibTeX'-Reference-Manager for paper-makers, is coming out soon. We are currently looking for alpha-testers!

Project based

Never lose the overview by creating a new project for each paper, each wit...
